text: Andrés Felipe Murillo Segura (born April 1, 1996) is a Colombian professional footballer who plays for Santos Laguna of Liga MX. ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:La Equidad footballers Category:Santos Laguna footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:People from Valle del Cauca Department
title: Andrés Murillo
